**Aktivasyon SeÃ§enekleri:**

**A) ONLINE Mode (Ä°nternet Var):**
```typescript
async function activateOnline(licenseKey: string) {
  const hardwareId = await getHardwareId();
  
  const response = await fetch('https://api.bader.com/activate', {
    method: 'POST',
    body: JSON.stringify({ 
      license_key: licenseKey,
      hardware_id: hardwareId,
      device_name: os.hostname()
    })
  });
  
  if (response.ok) {
    const { tenant, license, token } = await response.json();
    
    // Local storage'a kaydet
    await saveConfig({
      tenant_id: tenant.id,
      license_key: licenseKey,
      auth_token: token,
      mode: license.plan  // LOCAL, ONLINE, HYBRID
    });
    
    // Tenant setup'a geÃ§
    navigateTo('/setup');
  } else {
    // Hata: GeÃ§ersiz lisans, device limit aÅŸÄ±ldÄ±, vs.
    showError(response.error);
  }
}
```

## 2. Onboarding Checklist (Dashboard)

```tsx
// Ana sayfada gÃ¶sterilen checklist
export function OnboardingChecklist() {
  const steps = [
    { id: 1, title: 'Dernek bilgilerini tamamla', done: true },
    { id: 2, title: 'Ä°lk 5 Ã¼ye ekle', done: false, action: '/uyeler/yeni' },
    { id: 3, title: 'Aidat tanÄ±mlarÄ± oluÅŸtur', done: false },
    { id: 4, title: 'Ä°lk gelir kaydÄ±', done: false },
    { id: 5, title: 'YardÄ±mcÄ± personel ekle', done: false },
    { id: 6, title: 'Logo yÃ¼kle', done: false },
  ];
  
  const progress = steps.filter(s => s.done).length / steps.length * 100;
  
  return (
    <Card className="mb-4">
      <CardHeader>
        <CardTitle>BaÅŸlangÄ±Ã§ Rehberi</CardTitle>
        <Progress value={progress} />
        <span className="text-sm text-muted">{progress}% tamamlandÄ±</span>
      </CardHeader>
      <CardContent>
        {steps.map(step => (
          <div key={step.id} className="flex items-center gap-2 py-2">
            {step.done ? (
              <CheckCircle className="text-green-500" />
            ) : (
              <Circle className="text-gray-300" />
            )}
            <span>{step.title}</span>
            {!step.done && step.action && (
              <Button size="sm" onClick={() => navigate(step.action)}>
                BaÅŸla
              </Button>
            )}
          </div>
        ))}
      </CardContent>
    </Card>
  );
}
```

---

## 3. Sample Data Import

```python
# Ä°lk kurulumda Ã¶rnek veri yÃ¼kleme
@router.post("/api/setup/load-sample-data")
async def load_sample_data(
    tenant_id: str,
    current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user)
):
    # Ã–rnek Ã¼yeler
    sample_members = [
        {"ad_soyad": "Ahmet YÄ±lmaz", "telefon": "0532 111 1111", "tc_kimlik": "12345678901"},
        {"ad_soyad": "Mehmet Demir", "telefon": "0532 222 2222", "tc_kimlik": "12345678902"},
        # ... 50 Ã¼ye
    ]
    
    for member_data in sample_members:
        member = Uye(
            tenant_id=tenant_id,
            uye_no=generate_uye_no(),
            durum="Aktif",
            **member_data
        )
        db.add(member)
    
    # Ã–rnek aidat kayÄ±tlarÄ±
    for member in created_members:
        aidat = AidatTakip(
            tenant_id=tenant_id,
            uye_id=member.id,
            yil=2026,
            yillik_aidat_tutari=1200,
            durum="Bekliyor"
        )
        db.add(aidat)
    
    # Ã–rnek gelir/gider
    # ...
    
    db.commit()
    return {"success": True, "records_created": 150}
```

## 4. Interactive Tutorial (First-Time Walkthrough)

```typescript
// React Joyride entegrasyonu
import Joyride from 'react-joyride';

const tutorialSteps = [
  {
    target: '.sidebar-uyeler',
    content: 'Ãœye yÃ¶netimi buradan yapÄ±lÄ±r. Ä°lk Ã¼yenizi ekleyin!',
    placement: 'right'
  },
  {
    target: '.button-yeni-uye',
    content: 'Yeni Ãœye butonuna tÄ±klayarak baÅŸlayÄ±n.',
    placement: 'bottom'
  },
  {
    target: '.sidebar-aidat',
    content: 'Aidat takibi iÃ§in bu menÃ¼yÃ¼ kullanÄ±n.',
    placement: 'right'
  },
  {
    target: '.sidebar-mali',
    content: 'Gelir, gider ve kasa iÅŸlemleri buradan.',
    placement: 'right'
  },
  {
    target: '.navbar-notifications',
    content: 'Ã–nemli bildirimler burada gÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼r.',
    placement: 'bottom'
  }
];

export function FirstTimeWalkthrough() {
  const [runTutorial, setRunTutorial] = useState(
    localStorage.getItem('tutorial_completed') !== 'true'
  );
  
  return (
    <Joyride
      steps={tutorialSteps}
      run={runTutorial}
      continuous
      showSkipButton
      callback={(data) => {
        if (data.status === 'finished') {
          localStorage.setItem('tutorial_completed', 'true');
        }
      }}
    />
  );
}
```
